httpStatus.title: HTTP Status Codes
httpStatus.description: Click to trigger different HTTP errors and see how they're classified.
httpStatus.clickToTest: Click a status code button above

retryComparison.title: Retry Behavior
retryComparison.description: Compare how recoverable (5xx) vs non-recoverable (4xx) errors are handled.
retryComparison.noteText: 500 errors retry up to 3 times with exponential backoff. 404 errors fail immediately because they're not recoverable.

optimistic.title: Optimistic Updates
optimistic.note: Click "+1 (will fail)" to see rollback behavior

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.sampleText: This text changes when you switch languages.

prefetch.title: Prefetching
prefetch.description: Hover over buttons to prefetch data, then click to view instantly.
prefetch.hoverHint: Hover over an item to prefetch
prefetch.note: Prefetching on hover improves perceived performance

websocket.title: WebSocket Real-time
websocket.note: Counter updates from simulated users every few seconds

network.title: Network Status
network.note: TanStack Query pauses queries when offline

suspense.title: React Suspense
suspense.description: Uses useSuspenseQuery - component suspends while loading.
suspense.point1: Component throws a promise while loading
suspense.note: Suspense provides cleaner loading state management

parallel.title: Parallel Queries
parallel.note: Uses useQueries to fetch multiple data sources in parallel

mutationComparison.title: Mutation Comparison
mutationComparison.description: Compare standard vs optimistic mutations. Click both +1 buttons to see the difference.
mutationComparison.note: Optimistic updates provide instant feedback while syncing with server

subscription.title: Subscription
subscription.todoNote: Payment flows coming soon. This shows your current subscription status.
subscription.premiumRequired: This action requires a premium subscription

friends.title: Friends
friends.noFriends: No friends yet. Share your invite link!

notification.title: Notification Demo
notification.description: Test the notification system. Click a button to receive a Telegram message.
notification.note: Demonstrates worker tasks and Telegram bot messaging.

login.description: Sign in with your Telegram account to access your profile.

details.emailNotLinked: Email is not linked to your account.

login.description: Choose how you'd like to sign in

telegram.canRegister: New users will be registered automatically

usernameStep.description: Enter your Telegram username to receive a verification code.

usernameStep.hint: We'll send a 6-digit code to your Telegram DM.

codeStep.description: Enter the verification code sent to your Telegram.

errors.sendFailed: Failed to send code. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.

payment.redirectedMessage: You should have been redirected to the payment page. If not, click the button below.

success.title: Payment Successful
